alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:13PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Yavapai County near Mount Hope and Walnut Creek Ranger Station through 500 PM MST... At 411 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mount Hope to near the Walnut Creek Ranger Station. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, heavy rainfall, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walnut Creek Ranger Station and Mount Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storm clusters. If outdoors, get inside to sturdy shelter! If no shelter is available, be sure to avoid being the tallest object! Heavy rainfall may result in flooding...mainly of rural roads.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
